page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SUZANNE
page.content: I wake up in the morning when mum calls me at 7:45a.m. I dress and go downstairs for breakfast of toast.I wash,clean my teeth and make sure I have everything for school. I wipe the breakfast dishes and then my mum is ready to drive me and my little sister to school about 1\ miles away.School starts at 9:00a.m. and there we work very hard.We have dinner at midday.At 3:30p.m. school ends and mum or dad picks us up.I change from my school clothes into working clothes and find dad.He's usually fiddling with things in the field,like fixing gates and I help him.At five o' clock I fetch the cows for milking and help during milking by turning the handles to let the milk through the pipes into the tanks.We finish milking at 6:30p.m.I watch some television programmes before I go to bed at 9:00p.m.
